description.french: Termine l'Acte 1 de la ZONE SYLVANIA CASTLE.
description.german: Schließe Akt 1 der SYLVANIA CASTLE ZONE ab.
description.italian: Completa l'Atto 1 della ZONA SYLVANIA CASTLE.
description.japanese: SYLVANIA CASTLE ZONE ACT1を攻略する
description.spanish: Supera el Acto 1 de la ZONA SYLVANIA CASTLE.

displayName.japanese: ローリングコンビネーション！

description.english: Activate the Rolling Combo with Sonic and Tails.
description.french: Active le Combo terrestre avec Sonic et Tails.
description.german: Aktiviere die Roll-Kombo mit Sonic und Tails.
description.italian: Attiva la Combo rotante con Sonic e Tails.
description.japanese: ソニックとテイルスでローリングコンビネーションを発動させる
description.spanish: Activa el Combo giratorio con Sonic y Tails.

description.english: Defeat Metal Sonic in SKY FORTRESS ZONE, Act 1.
description.french: Bats Metal Sonic dans l'Acte 1 de la ZONE SKY FORTRESS.
description.german: Besiege Metal Sonic in Akt 1 der SKY FORTRESS ZONE.
description.italian: Batti Metal Sonic nell'Atto 1 della ZONA SKY FORTRESS.
description.japanese: SKY FORTRESS ZONE ACT1に登場するメタルソニックを撃墜する
description.spanish: Derrota a Metal Sonic en el Acto 1 de la ZONA SKY FORTRESS.

description.english: Defeat all bosses as Super Sonic.
description.french: Bats tous les boss avec Super Sonic.
description.german: Besiege alle Bosse als Super Sonic.
description.italian: Batti tutti i boss con Super Sonic.
description.japanese: スーパーソニックの姿で全てのボスを撃破する
description.spanish: Derrota a todos los jefes finales como Super Sonic.

displayName.japanese: 全ステージ クリア!

description.english: Defeat the final foe and watch the ending.
description.french: Bats l'ennemi final et regarde la dernière scène.
description.german: Besiege den letzten Feind und sieh dir das Ende an.
description.italian: Sconfiggi l'ultimo nemico e guarda il finale.
description.japanese: 最後の敵を倒し、エンディングを見る
description.spanish: Derrota al enemigo final y mira el final.

description.english: Upload a Multiplayer score or time.
description.french: Termine un Acte en mode multijoueur.
description.german: Schließe einen Akt im Mehrspielermodus ab.
description.japanese: マルチプレイでどこか1アクトを攻略する
description.spanish: Completa un Acto en modo Multijugador.

displayName.japanese: アイ ラブ テイルス

description.japanese: テイルスで50回以上プレイする

description.english: Beat Special Stage 1 after collecting every Ring.
description.french: Réussis l'étape spéciale 1 après avoir ramassé chaque Ring.
description.german: Schließe Speziallevel 1 ab, nachdem du alle Ringe gesammelt hast.
description.italian: Supera la Fase speciale 1 dopo aver raccolto tutti i Ring.
description.japanese: SPECIAL STAGE １に配置されている、リングを全て取得してからクリアする
description.spanish: Supera la fase especial 1 después de conseguir todos los Rings.

description.english: Clear all stages without returning to the World Map.
description.french: Termine toutes les étapes sans revenir à la carte du monde.
description.german: Schließe alle Levels ab, ohne zur Weltkarte zurückzukehren.
description.italian: Supera tutte le fasi senza far ritorno alla mappa del mondo.
description.japanese: ワールドマップに戻らずに一度で全てのステージをクリアする
description.spanish: Supera todas las fases sin volver al mapa del mundo.

displayName.japanese: カオスエメラルド コンプリート！

description.italian: Ottieni tutti e sette i Chaos Emerald.
description.japanese: ７つのカオスエメラルドをすべて手に入れる

description.english: Clear SYLVANIA CASTLE ZONE, Act 1 in one minute or less.
description.french: Termine l'Acte 1 de la ZONE SYLVANIA CASTLE en moins d'une minute.
description.german: Schließe Akt 1 der SYLVANIA CASTLE ZONE in weniger als einer Minute ab.
description.italian: Supera l'Atto 1 della ZONA SYLVANIA CASTLE in meno di un minuto.
description.japanese: SYLVANIA CASTLE ZONE ACT1を１分以内にクリアする
description.spanish: Supera el Acto 1 de la ZONA SYLVANIA CASTLE en un minuto o menos.

displayName.japanese: レッドスターリング コンプリート！

description.french: Bats l'ennemi final après avoir ramassé toutes les Rings Étoile Rouge.
description.german: Besiege den letzten Feind, nachdem du alle Roten Sternenringe gesammelt hast.
description.italian: Sconfiggi l'ultimo nemico dopo aver raccolto tutti i Ring Stella rossa.
description.japanese: 全てのレッドスターリングを獲得した後で、最後の敵を撃破する
description.spanish: Derrota al enemigo final tras conseguir todos los Rings estrella roja.
